name: Create Response
description: Create a response using the OpenRouter Responses API. This endpoint supports multi-turn conversations with built-in tool use, web search, and file handling.

properties.helptext: The model to use for the response, e.g. openai/gpt-4o, anthropic/claude-sonnet-4, google/gemini-2.5-pro. See https://openrouter.ai/models for available models.
The input to generate a response for. Can be a simple text string or a JSON array of message objects for multi-turn conversations.
